title: ZackVMK's ACS Icon Page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:fade-in speed=3]]
[[module CSS]]

.icon_image_black {
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: 0.25rem solid  rgb(0,0,0);
    overflow: hidden;
    background-color: rgb(0,0,0)
}

.icon_image_cheese {
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: 0.25rem solid  rgb(0,0,0);
    overflow: hidden;
    background-color: rgb(230,138,9)
}

[[/module]]

[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]

[[module css]]

.icons {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(5, calc((100% / 5) - 0.25rem));
    grid-gap: 0.25rem;
}

@media (max-width: 500px ) {
    .icons {
     grid-template-columns: repeat(3, calc((100% / 3) - 0.25rem));
    }
}

.icon_image {
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: 0.25rem solid  rgb(0,0,0);
    overflow: hidden;
}

.icon_name,
.icon_link {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}

[[/module]]






















+ You're confused because there's no [[[component:anomaly-class-bar|ACS]]] icon you're looking to use, right?

+++ You're in the right place.

----


Howdy, welcome to my art page! This is the place where I am going to publish my works, mainly ACS icons. Some of them are derivated from other's icons so that's explained why they look similar to each other. I hope you like my works!

This page is translated and pulled from my original art page at VN Branch, this may have differences from the original one due to licensing problems. Access the original page stored at VN Branch [http://scp-vn.wikidot.com/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page here].

There are a lot of people who do better than me, so you can check it out [[[calibri-s-mega-cool-art-page-it-s-mostly-just-icons-but-what|here]]] or [[[more-acs-icons|here]]]. If you want me to design you a few icons then you can send me a private message.

You can find it [[[esoteric-classes-complete-list|here]]] and [https://www.reddit.com/r/SCP/comments/6jcemh/master_list_of_nonstandard_object_classes/ here] to understand its definition.

**Note:** The following icons are all originally 1400px and the file format is SVG. If you want to download it as PNG, you can download the File to go home.

[[tabview]]
[[tab Classes and icons]]
----
[[=]]
+ Esoteric Classes
++ Established Esoteric Classes
[[/=]]
----

||~ Icon ||~ Definition ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Argus.svg width="90px"]] || **Argus:** Item's containment is under the purview of a third party. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Drygiony.svg width="90px"]] || **Drygioni:** Item is currently under an official investigation for authenticity by the Overseer Council. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Eparch.svg width="90px"]] || **Eparch:** Item is non-anomalous but related to the anomalous. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Gevurah.svg width="90px"]] || **Gevurah:** Item endangers the inner structure of the Foundation and limits the ability of the Foundation to carry out its secondary objectives. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Israfil.svg width="90px"]] || **Israfil:** Item relates to or is the result of Action 10-Israfil-A. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Khonsu.svg width="90px"]] || **Khonsu:** The item is expected to be neutralized shortly by uncontrollable circumstances, making research a high priority. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Non-Anomalous.svg width="90px"]] || **Non-Anomalous:** N/A. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Spiritual.svg width="90px"]] || **Spiritual:** Item transcends different realities; the exact origin of this object class is unknown due to the nature of its singular usage. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Uncontainable.svg width="90px"]] || **Uncontainable:** N/A ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Unknown.svg width="90px"]] || **Unknown:** N/A ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Unnecessary.svg width="90px"]] || **Unnecessary:** N/A ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Zeno.svg width="90px"]] || **Zeno:** Item has medium containment difficulty and is low threat. ||


----
[[=]]
++ Subclasses
[[/=]]

+++ Suffix System

||~ Icon ||~ Definition ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Alterius.svg width="90px"]] || **Alterius:** Item is alien to Earth, extraterrestrially or extradimensionally. ||

+++ Type System

||~ Icon ||~ Definition ||
|||| Not yet. ||

+++ Object/Containment System

||~ Icon ||~ Definition ||
|||| Not yet. ||

+++ Additional Systems

||~ Icon ||~ Definition ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Paradox-Apollyon.svg width="90px"]] || **Paradox-Apollyon:** Item will inevitably destroy mankind and can be contained by the pre-emptive destruction of human life. ||

----
[[=]]
++ System Classes
[[/=]]
----

||~ Icon ||~ Definition ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/See%20Below.svg width="90px"]] || **See Below:** Item constitutes several anomalies with distinct object classes. ||

----
[[=]]
++ Informal Esoteric Classes
[[/=]]
----

||~ Icon ||~ Definition ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Azathorth.svg width="90px"]] || **Azathorth:** Item is incredibly dangerous and destructive. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Echelon.svg width="90px"]] || **Echelon:** Item is the highest priority of the Foundation. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/In%20doubt.svg width="90px"]] || **In doubt:** Item's effect precludes the usage of extant object classes. ||

----
[[=]]
++ Foreign Esoteric Classes
[[/=]]
----

||~ Icon ||~ Definition ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Ain-Soph-Aur.svg width="90px"]] || **Ain-Soph-Aur:** Item is the only object that guarantees the survival and inheritance of normal humanity. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Aisna.svg width="90px"]] || **Aisna:** Item generates anomalies, can be activated by a sentient being, and is related to a deity or reality's origin. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Bakkhos.svg width="90px"]] || **Bakkhos:** Item blurs the distinction between life and death, changing the significance and concept of containment and protection and collapsing normality. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Dagdagiel.svg width="90px"]] || **Dagdagiel:** The report of the item is written in the dream. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Hod.svg width="90px"]] || **Hod:** Item can significantly impact the Foundation's operations, but will only do so if the Foundation allows it. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Malkuth.svg width="90px"]] || **Malkuth:** Item is or belongs to an advanced non-human civilization. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Nagi.svg width="90px"]] || **Nagi:** Item has lost its anomalous or dangerous features in a long span for some reason. The containment protocol will be continued, and will be immediately replaced with the appropriate object class if there are signs of anomalous activity again. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Necropsar.svg width="90px"]] || **Necropsar:** Item currently has no reliable evidence supporting its existence in the standard Human History Process (H-001), but can be confirmed to potentially exist through observations made by the Department of Historical Observation and Planning regarding other Human History Processes and hidden signs currently in H-001. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Pantokrat%C5%8Dr.svg width="90px"]] || **Pantokrat≈çr:** Item is too large for containment to be realistic. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Tenebrarius.svg width="90px"]] || **Tenebrarius:** The Foundation does not and cannot possess information about the item. ||

----

+* Some icons for the classification I invented myself

These classifications are the ones that I came up with myself. They have not been used or will be used in the future.

[[tabview]]
[[tab Classes and icons]]
----
[[=]]
+ Secondary Class
[[/=]]
----

||~ Icon ||~ Definition ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Definire.svg width="90px"]] || **Definire:** Item change the concept of anomalies. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Pranota.svg width="90px"]] || **Pranota:** Item may cause XK-Class End-of-the-World if being acknowledge by any entity. ||

----
[[=]]
+ Disruption Classes
[[/=]]
----

||~ Icon ||~ Definition ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Nota.svg width="90px"]] || **Nota:** Item was known to civilians before it was considered an anomaly. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Oris.svg width="90px"]] || **Oris:** Item is useful for the Foundation but ordinary people need to know it as an anomaly. ||

[[=]]

|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Mutatio.svg width="90px"]] || **Mutatio:** Item that cause mutations in humans make humans new species and may indirectly cause the SK-Class Dominance Shift Scenario. ||

----

+* Contribution icons

These are icons contributed by others from the original page. These can be icons for existing classifications or for new classifications. I hope you like it.

[[tabview]]
[[tab Classes and icons]]
----
[[=]]
+ Secondary Classes

||~ Icon ||~ Definition ||~ Made by ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Atlas.svg width="90px"]] || **Atlas:** Item is capable of causing YK-Class events in the future that are unable to be dealt with. || [[*user The No Face]] and [[*user ZackVMK-13]] ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Mendax.svg width="90px"]] || **Mendax:** N/A. || [[*user The No Face]] and [[*user ZackVMK-13]] ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Nehemoth.svg width="90px"]] || **Nehemoth:** N/A. || [[*user Dr B2]] and [[*user ZackVMK-13]] ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Ragnarok.svg width="90px"]] || **Ragnarok:** Item appear to exhibit similar characteristics as Apollyon-Class SCPs, but in reality are merely influencing their document's writer. Similar to Azathoth-Class, but on a larger, more Norwegian scale. || [[*user The No Face]] and [[*user ZackVMK-13]] ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/zackvmk-s-acs-icon-page/Semipalis.png width="90px"]] || **Semipalis:** Item that has the same characteristic with Principalis-Class item except it's only affect some few O5. || [[*user Laggy000929]] ||

+* Thank you

Thank you [[*user Duy Giang]] for giving me these amazing artworks and I have no words left to describe how happy I am now. You can see other paintings on his [[[duy-giang-s-artworks|Artwork]]], [https://www.instagram.com/duygiang_1207/ Instagram], [https://twitter.com/duygiang_1207 Twitter] or [https://www.deviantart.com/duygiang1207 DeviantArt] page. I also greatly appreciate [[*user The No Face]], [[*user Dr B2]], [[*user Laggy000929]] and [[*user Ts StreetBoii]] for collaborating and helping me create ACS icons. I'm also very grateful to everyone for my good reviews and help me so much.
